description:
Shinobu was chieftain Hanzo`s errand girl. Bonnie thought that she would be the perfect wife for her big brother Clemont until she revealed that she was disguising her actual looks. She is in fact 100 years old. Hanzo always thought that Shinobu`s tea was the greatest.
She went with the other villagers to rescue Hanzo from Kagetomo and battled with Clemont and Serena to take on the ninja corps underlings.
name: Shinobu
